name: JustSoHappy
text: Really nice and clean place. Nothing negative to report.

name: Alex Church
text: Amazing school system easily the best schools in the wiregrass

name: Tommy Lawrence
text: Enterprise City Schools has a superior facilities department with a top notch group of folks.

name: Christina Thompson
text: Good school systems

name: Elizabeth Jones
text: Amazing place to work

name: Detrect Skinner JR
text: Friendly staff..  Very clean facilities

name: Pamela Miller
text: I work there

name: Phil Schmidt
text: Our 3 boys are products of the Madison City Schools. The rigorous academic courses, wide variety of sports, arts, and student government opportunities prepared them very well for college and life in general. Walking into the schools you quickly sense a positive atmosphere. Teachers, administrators and students want to be there and are confident good things are going to happen every day. The school board members serve for 5 years with no pay. Only people with a strong desire to keep improving schools would do such a thing. Our sons weren't all at the head of the class, but every one of them said they were well-prepared, and often much better prepared at the 4-year universities and 2-year community college they attended. You'd be hard pressed to find a superintendent anywhere in the country that puts as much heart and soul into knowing the students and working for higher standards in a public school system.

name: DeShawna Scott
text:
Everyone is friendly and wants to help. Sometimes there is a little breakdown in the process and you end up a little frustrated. The 'online' answer is very frustrating since there was a problem with one of the process.

Overall it's one of the best School districts to deal with and best set if schools.

name: Destin Klein
text: The Madison City School system, school board, and superintendent are top notch!

name: Jon Jackson
text:
SCHOOL BUS HITS MY TRUCK and this is what i am dealing with Lucy Sellers
Aug 7 (3 days ago)

to me

ATBE's offer included the full cost to repair your vehicle as documented by the Landers McLarty Chevrolet itemization.  ATBE does not pay for rental vehicles up front, therefore the rental vehicle charges were excluded from the base offer.  ATBE's offer included a more than generous reimbursement option if a rental vehicle is necessary while your vehicle is being repaired.

Please also understand that your vehicle was parked on the side of a road near an intersection and the location of your parked automobile contributed to damage sustained.

If you are uncomfortable with ATBE's offer then you may elect to assert a claim to your personal commercial automobile insurance company, who may then elect to assert a subrogation claim for reimbursement.

Again, if you have any questions please email me.

name: William Harlan
text: Very helpful,nice and knowledgeable staff

resp.text: Thanks for the great review William!

name: Steve Downey
text: They had the truck waiting on me to pick it up

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Steve!

name: Jason Allen
text: Takes for ever to get something done. People can't make appointments for breakdowns and they don't seem to be in any kind of a hurry to help get your problem solved. Also they expect some to wait in the drivers lounge while it's ok for others not to while your truck is in the shop. I can see where service is affecting sales for sure because who wants to spend a dime on a truck when you can't get the service you need when something goes wrong. But, on a positive note, the people at the Mack dealership up the road love the job you are doing Truckworx so keep it up. Their sales are through the roof.

name: Kenneth Sheppard
text: They have some of the best staff anyone could ask for. They go out of their way to make sure their customers are satisfied. They have one of the greatest parts department and shop I have ever had any dealings with. I highly recommend Truckworx Kenworth to anybody.

name: Clayton McInnis
text: Extremely quick service with last minute notice. All employees were kind and eager to help with my issues.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Clayton!

name: Michael McPherson
text: Great service. Nice people. Fair and efficient.

name: James Eaton
text: I was good got a chance to see some good friend

resp.text: Thanks for the great review James!

name: Rebecca Thelen
text: great group of people. they are fast and friendly.

name: Gary Lott
text: Six hours for a full service and a overhead

name: Chris B
text: Fast and friendly
